body:
Hello guys. my name is michael "RubellaNL"
and i heard that Avicus has the problem of Inactive Developers and that ALM is the only 1 that is active with the last Updates on Atlas
i want all jour votes if you want me as Developer on The Avicus network,
im currently working on some dutch plugins called "Minetopia"
but i can code more with some help with Active developers bec i dont know if my code experience is Diffrent that the style of Avicus Developers on here.

im currently coding for like 4 years for now and i still like it to make some plugins like Teams | Deathmessages | Economy plugins Etc etc


POLL: http://www.strawpoll.me/11636980
Vote protection is Enabled so dont try to set fake votes Thanks!
Greets RubellaNL | michael
Age: 23
City: Netherlands
Language: Dutch English

replies.body:
If you wish to become a Developer, you can apply by following these steps:

 https://github.com/Avicus/Developers/blob/master/README.md

Good Luck.
